content.description: Sit start with a sloping left hand bump and a right hand sidepull edge. From there, move up to a pair of sloping bumps, make a big move to the jug shelf, follow to the prominent horizontal seam, and drop off.
content.protection: A pad. This has a great landing.

content.description: Sit start with a pair of fantastic huecos. From there, climb up through generous features while trending slight left, match on the hueco, and drop off.
content.protection: A pad. It has a perfect landing.

content.description: Sit start with a right hand edge and a left hand sidepull. From there, gain a right hand edge, stick a big left hand move to the shelf, follow to the prominent horizontal seam, and drop off.
content.protection: A pad. It has a perfect landing.

content.description: This is the huge traverse on almost all steep jugs for over 200 feet. It feels natural to climb it right to left, but left to right would also be fine.  It is so fun and only 10 minutes from GJ!
content.location: From Whitewater, head west up Unaweep for a couple miles, park at the first big pullout on the right. The traverse is right next to the parking lot.

content.description: Sit start matched in a huge hueco. From there, move right edge, match on it, then head up through jug dishes, traverse left to the nose, make a big static move, match on the generous shelf above, and drop off.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is very good though.

content.description: Sit start matched on a jug edge. From there, dyno with the right hand to a perfect jug feature, match on it, continue up and slight left via great holds to the prominent horizontal seam, and drop off.
content.protection: A pad will work fine. The landing is perfect.

content.description: Sit start matched on a perfect jug. From there, move to a right hand incut edge, follow to the jug above, gain the horizontal seam, and drop off.
content.protection: A pad will be fine. The landing is a beach.

content.description: Sit start matched on a jug. From there, work up and up right via some big moves with generous features to an awesome dish pinch, gain a blind edge around the roof, match on it, follow to the prominent horizontal seam above, and drop off.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is perfect though.

content.description: Sit start matched in a hueco with a right heel hook. From there, work through a two-finger edge to a good edge above, follow through a series of jug dishes, make a big move to the nose, match on it, and drop off.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is perfect though.
content.location: It climbs the prominent nose of the Rockshop Wall.
